# tidbcloud_dedicated_private_link_service (Data Source)

dedicated private link service data source



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) The ID of the cluster.
- `node_group_id` (String) The ID of the TiDB node group.

### Read-Only

- `available_zones` (List of String) The availability zones where the private link service is available.
- `cloud_provider` (String) The cloud provider of the private link service.
- `region_display_name` (String) The display name of the region where the private link service is located.
- `region_id` (String) The ID of the region where the private link service is located.
- `service_dns_name` (String) The DNS name of the private link service.
- `service_name` (String) The service name of the private link service.
- `state` (String) The state of the private link service.
